logoPrompt: Design a sleek, modern logo featuring a stylized 'E' and 'N' with blue gradients, symbolizing digital connectivity. Incorporate elements of a web globe or network lines to reflect online presence. Use a professional sans-serif font.

hero.headline: Your First Step Online — Made Easy

about.title: About Entry Nets
about.description: Entry Nets is your hassle-free launchpad for getting your business online. We build beautiful, modern websites tailored to new businesses needing a quick, affordable, and professional start. With our all-inclusive standard package, you'll have a fully mobile-responsive website live within days, complete with domain registration, hosting, and an easy-to-use admin portal for content updates. Focus on your business, and let us handle the tech.
about.imagePrompt: Design an inviting office space with tech gadgets like laptops and large monitors displaying website designs, embodying a tech-savvy and modern work environment.

services.title: Our Services
services.description: At Entry Nets, we offer a variety of services to cater to your online business needs. From standard packages to custom solutions, we've got you covered.

items.title: Standard Package
items.description: A complete solution with a mobile-responsive website, free domain, and hosting for £250/year or £25/month. Get your website live within days!
details: Free domain name registration or transfer

items.title: Custom Designs
items.description: Want something unique? We offer custom-tailored designs to match your brand identity and business needs.

items.title: Additional Features
items.description: Enhance your website with contact forms, booking integrations, galleries, and more. We provide SSL certificates and performance optimizations.

items.title: Analytics Setup
items.description: Track your website's visits and growth with analytics setup. Gain insights to optimize your online strategy.

items.title: Security
items.description: SSL certificates and robust security measures ensure your site stays secure.

items.title: Fast Setup
items.description: Get online quickly with our efficient processes and dedication to speed.

items.title: Dedicated Support
items.description: Our team is here to support you through every step of your digital journey.

items.title: Performance
items.description: Optimized for performance, your site will load quickly and run smoothly.

images.title: Tech Startup
images.description: A sleek, responsive design for a technology startup.
images.imagePrompt: Create a stunning, modern business website example with soft blue tones and sleek typography. It should appear user-friendly and highly professional.

images.title: E-commerce Platform
images.description: A vibrant, user-focused e-commerce website design.
images.imagePrompt: Render a colorful, interactive e-commerce site with product displays and shopping cart icons. The design should convey excitement and ease of use.

images.title: Creative Portfolio
images.description: An elegant portfolio website for showcasing creative work.
images.imagePrompt: Illustrate an elegant portfolio website layout, using minimalist aesthetic and artful imagery to present creative work.

images.title: Corporate Solutions
images.description: Professional corporate website design emphasizing reliability.
images.imagePrompt: Draw a professional corporate website featuring a clean, structured layout with sophisticated blue colors and a strong emphasis on brand trust.

quotes.name: John Doe
quotes.quote: Entry Nets transformed our online presence swiftly and efficiently. We love the outcome!

quotes.name: Jane Smith
quotes.quote: Amazing service! Fast, friendly, and exactly what we needed for our startup.

quotes.name: Michael Johnson
quotes.quote: Our website is not just functional but beautifully reflects our brand thanks to Entry Nets.

items.question: What does the standard package include?
items.answer: The standard package includes a complete, mobile-responsive website, free domain registration, hosting, and a portal to update your content.

items.question: How quickly can I get my website live?
items.answer: We aim to have your site designed and live within days, providing you with a fast and efficient service.

items.question: Can I request custom designs?
items.answer: Absolutely! We offer custom-tailored designs to match your specific brand needs and preferences.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Ready to get your business online? Reach out to us and let's make it happen.
